data.text: Haa, haa………… Last one……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa………… Last one……!

data.text:
The yearly summer training camp. 
Mejiro Dober's training was proceeding smoothly as planned.
data.processed:
󠁿The yearly summer training camp. 
󠁿Mejiro Dober's training was proceeding smoothly as planned.

data.text:
Hey, hey, which festival stalls do you want to hit up? 
I want to eat a candy apple!
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
󠁿Hey, hey, which festival stalls do you want to hit up? 
󠁿I want to eat a candy apple!

data.text:
And we can't skip the grilled carrots either! 
Wish it was night time already～.
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
󠁿And we can't skip the grilled carrots either! 
󠁿Wish it was night time already～.

data.text:
Since there was going to be a festival tonight, 
everyone seemed a little more excited than usual during training.
data.processed:
󠁿Since there was going to be a festival tonight, 
󠁿everyone seemed a little more excited than usual during training.

data.text:
……you've been looking at me for a while now, 
is something wrong? Do I have sand on my face?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: No……you just seem like your normal self
choices.processed: <size=40>No……you just seem like your normal self</size>

data.processed:
󠁿……you've been looking at me for a while now, 
󠁿is something wrong? Do I have sand on my face?

data.text:
Ha? Isn't that normal? Rather than that, make sure 
you're properly tracking my back-and-forth dashes.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Ha? Isn't that normal? Rather than that, make sure 
󠁿you're properly tracking my back-and-forth dashes.

data.text:
I am my normal self though……? Rather than that, next up is 
back-and-forth dashes, right? Can you track my time?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I am my normal self though……? Rather than that, next up is 
󠁿back-and-forth dashes, right? Can you track my time?

data.text:
A couple hours after training had finished. The 
dorms were unusually quiet. Most of the students 
must have headed out to the summer festival.
data.processed:
󠁿A couple hours after training had finished. The 
󠁿dorms were unusually quiet. Most of the students 
󠁿must have headed out to the summer festival.

data.text:
A couple hours after training had finished. The 
dorms were unusually quiet. Most of the students 
must have headed out to the summer festival.
data.processed:
󠁿A couple hours after training had finished. The 
󠁿dorms were unusually quiet. Most of the students 
󠁿must have headed out to the summer festival.

data.text: Oh, Trainer? So you stayed behind, huh.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: You're not going to the festival?
You're not going to the festival?

data.processed: 󠁿Oh, Trainer? So you stayed behind, huh.

data.text:
I have something I need to take care of. 
And when there's nobody around, it's easier to focus.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I have something I need to take care of. 
󠁿And when there's nobody around, it's easier to focus.

data.text: …………Hey, Trainer. Can you draw backgrounds?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿…………Hey, Trainer. Can you draw backgrounds?

data.text:
Well…… you see, I was making a 『Veggie Carolyn』 
picture book based on the movie.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Well…… you see, I was making a 『Veggie Carolyn』 
󠁿picture book based on the movie.

data.text:
Ah-, sorry. It's a weird thing to ask all of 
a sudden, huh? You see…… I'm making a storybook 
version of the 『Veggie Carolyn』 movie.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Ah-, sorry. It's a weird thing to ask all of 
󠁿a sudden, huh? You see…… I'm making a storybook 
󠁿version of the 『Veggie Carolyn』 movie.

data.text:
My little brother and sister…… it seems like they can't go to the 
theater. Probably because they're not old enough to be able to 
sit still for that long.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿My little brother and sister…… it seems like they can't go to the 
󠁿theater. Probably because they're not old enough to be able to 
󠁿sit still for that long.

data.text:
My little brother and sister…… it seems like they can't go to the 
theater. Probably because they're not old enough to be able to 
sit still for that long.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿My little brother and sister…… it seems like they can't go to the 
󠁿theater. Probably because they're not old enough to be able to 
󠁿sit still for that long.

data.text:
That's why, I was thinking of making a picture book about that 
story for them…… That way they can enjoy it too, right?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, I was thinking of making a picture book about that 
󠁿story for them…… That way they can enjoy it too, right?

data.text:
And, I was able to draw the characters but…… there's just an 
endless number of backgrounds. Even doing just one, takes a 
really long time, you see……
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿And, I was able to draw the characters but…… there's just an 
󠁿endless number of backgrounds. Even doing just one, takes a 
󠁿really long time, you see……

data.text:
That makes sense, the movie took place on an uninhabited island 
so there were various backgrounds. Beaches, a forest, and an 
abandoned villa, etc.――
data.processed:
󠁿That makes sense, the movie took place on an uninhabited island 
󠁿so there were various backgrounds. Beaches, a forest, and an 
󠁿abandoned villa, etc.――

data.text: Eh, photos……? What do you mean by that?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Eh, photos……? What do you mean by that?

data.text:
We're near a beach right now. There's a forest nearby too. On top 
of that, this dorm kind of looks like a villa. In other words, it 
has all the places from the movie.
data.processed:
󠁿We're near a beach right now. There's a forest nearby too. On top 
󠁿of that, this dorm kind of looks like a villa. In other words, it 
󠁿has all the places from the movie.

data.text:
In that case, she could cut out the pictures of the characters 
and take photos of them in front of a background. I suggested it 
might be easier to finish it this way.
data.processed:
󠁿In that case, she could cut out the pictures of the characters 
󠁿and take photos of them in front of a background. I suggested it 
󠁿might be easier to finish it this way.

data.text: ……………………You, are you really Trainer? That's a great idea.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿……………………You, are you really Trainer? That's a great idea.

data.text: Trainer, that's a really good idea!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer, that's a really good idea!

data.text:
I could get the photos I took printed out larger, 
and if I attached them to a large paper……it 
would definitely be like a storybook!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I could get the photos I took printed out larger, 
󠁿and if I attached them to a large paper……it 
󠁿would definitely be like a storybook!

data.text:
I could get the photos I took printed out larger, 
and if I attached them to a large paper……it 
would definitely be like a storybook!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I could get the photos I took printed out larger, 
󠁿and if I attached them to a large paper……it 
󠁿would definitely be like a storybook!

data.text:
Then I just need to cut out the characters, then take pictures on 
the beach―― I wonder if I can finish before everyone comes back!?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Then I just need to cut out the characters, then take pictures on 
󠁿the beach―― I wonder if I can finish before everyone comes back!?

data.text: ……I figured you'd say that.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿……I figured you'd say that.

data.text: Yeah, I was expecting that.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah, I was expecting that.

data.text:
Even if I declined the offer, you're not one to give up, I guess. 
I think I'm starting to understand you better.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Even if I declined the offer, you're not one to give up, I guess. 
󠁿I think I'm starting to understand you better.

data.text:
Trainer, before you told me that if I was troubled 
by anything I should talk to you, right? That's 
why, I was planning on asking you.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer, before you told me that if I was troubled 
󠁿by anything I should talk to you, right? That's 
󠁿why, I was planning on asking you.

data.text: Alright, let's meet up in the main room in five minutes.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Alright, let's meet up in the main room in five minutes.

data.text: Alright, let's meet up in the main room in five minutes.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Alright, let's meet up in the main room in five minutes.

data.text:
Then, after cutting out all the character illustrations―― 
we moved on to the photography work.
data.processed:
󠁿Then, after cutting out all the character illustrations―― 
󠁿we moved on to the photography work.

data.text:
Then, after cutting out all the character illustrations―― 
we moved on to the photography work.
data.processed:
󠁿Then, after cutting out all the character illustrations―― 
󠁿we moved on to the photography work.

data.text:
Trainer, more to the right! Stretch your arms out as much as you 
can! Otherwise you'll be in the picture too!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer, more to the right! Stretch your arms out as much as you 
󠁿can! Otherwise you'll be in the picture too!

data.text:
Trainer? Is there something about the window……ah, that's good! So 
I can make the characters stand behind the window! Like watching 
them from outside the room!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer? Is there something about the window……ah, that's good! So 
󠁿I can make the characters stand behind the window! Like watching 
󠁿them from outside the room!

data.text:
I want the running to be a bit more realistic. 
Trainer, can you dash for a bit?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I want the running to be a bit more realistic. 
󠁿Trainer, can you dash for a bit?

data.text:
What, you're gonna leave it there? Fufuu, that's kind of 
mysterious! Searching for the characters in the backgrounds would 
be fun! Thanks for the idea!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿What, you're gonna leave it there? Fufuu, that's kind of 
󠁿mysterious! Searching for the characters in the backgrounds would 
󠁿be fun! Thanks for the idea!

data.text:
I'll get a picture of the beach during daytime tomorrow. 
For now, this will be the last for tonight.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I'll get a picture of the beach during daytime tomorrow. 
󠁿For now, this will be the last for tonight.

data.text:
I'll get a picture of the beach during daytime tomorrow. 
For now, this will be the last for tonight.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I'll get a picture of the beach during daytime tomorrow. 
󠁿For now, this will be the last for tonight.

data.text: Don't move, Trainer. 3, 2, 1――
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Don't move, Trainer. 3, 2, 1――

data.text: Okay, got itー!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Okay, got itー!

data.text: (Hyururururu……Bang! Boooom!!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Hyururururu……Bang! Boooom!!)

data.text: Fireworks……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: 󠁿Fireworks……!

data.text: The festival……is probably over by now……
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Do you want to head over now?

data.processed: 󠁿The festival……is probably over by now……

data.text:
The stalls are probably all closed by now, don't you think? 
And I already asked Ryan and the others to get some souvenirs.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿The stalls are probably all closed by now, don't you think? 
󠁿And I already asked Ryan and the others to get some souvenirs.

data.text:
――But festivals, huh…… I used to go to them 
with Ryan and the others all the time.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿――But festivals, huh…… I used to go to them 
󠁿with Ryan and the others all the time.

data.text:
Fuee…… there are so many people…… 
Ryan, don't let go of my hand…… no matter what.
data.name: Young Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Fuee…… there are so many people…… 
󠁿Ryan, don't let go of my hand…… no matter what.

data.text:
Ah…… cotton candy. Ryan, I found cotton candy. 
See, over there. C'mon, let's eat some cotton candy, okay?
data.name: Young Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Ah…… cotton candy. Ryan, I found cotton candy. 
󠁿See, over there. C'mon, let's eat some cotton candy, okay?

data.text:
I'd get Ryan to hold my hand. Saying I want to do that, I want to 
eat that, and I'd end up dragging her around like that……
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I'd get Ryan to hold my hand. Saying I want to do that, I want to 
󠁿eat that, and I'd end up dragging her around like that……

data.text:
My mom was usually busy with work. Because of 
that, when I was little, I'd play with everyone 
at the Mejiro household pretty often.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿My mom was usually busy with work. Because of 
󠁿that, when I was little, I'd play with everyone 
󠁿at the Mejiro household pretty often.

data.text:
Ryan looked after me a lot…… 一When I was with her, 
I'd feel reassured and it was always fun.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Ryan looked after me a lot…… 一When I was with her, 
󠁿I'd feel reassured and it was always fun.

data.text:
That's why when I got a little sister and brother…… 
I thought it was my turn to be a proper big sister.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿That's why when I got a little sister and brother…… 
󠁿I thought it was my turn to be a proper big sister.

data.text:
All the things she did for me that made me happy…… 
I wanted to do the same thing for them.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿All the things she did for me that made me happy…… 
󠁿I wanted to do the same thing for them.

data.text:
Though, so far I haven't been able to do anything for them. 
I live in the dorms, so I don't get many chances to see them though.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Though, so far I haven't been able to do anything for them. 
󠁿I live in the dorms, so I don't get many chances to see them though.

data.text:
And when I meet them…… I don't really 
know how to interact with them.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿And when I meet them…… I don't really 
󠁿know how to interact with them.

data.text:
But just recently, when I happened to be drawing 『Veggie Carolyn』, 
they started begging me to draw more.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: So that's why you were practicing
So that's why you were practicing

data.processed:
󠁿But just recently, when I happened to be drawing 『Veggie Carolyn』, 
󠁿they started begging me to draw more.

data.text:
Yeah. I can kind of draw…… so I wondered if I 
could draw anything for them…… and here we are.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: So you thought of a storybook
So you thought of a storybook

data.processed:
󠁿Yeah. I can kind of draw…… so I wondered if I 
󠁿could draw anything for them…… and here we are.

data.text:
Palmer always had a storybook with her. Fufu…… 
even now it feels like I'm always relying on my older sisters.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: You look like an older sister now

data.processed:
󠁿Palmer always had a storybook with her. Fufu…… 
󠁿even now it feels like I'm always relying on my older sisters.

data.text:
Hee!? I-I look like an older sister? What do you mean……!? 
Trainer, aren't you just saying that?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Hee!? I-I look like an older sister? What do you mean……!? 
󠁿Trainer, aren't you just saying that?

data.text:
I-I look like an older sister……? 
I don't really know if I do but…… do you think so?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I-I look like an older sister……? 
󠁿I don't really know if I do but…… do you think so?

data.text:
I don't think I'm anything like a big sister though. But, if they 
can enjoy this storybook then…… maybe just a little bit……
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I don't think I'm anything like a big sister though. But, if they 
󠁿can enjoy this storybook then…… maybe just a little bit……

data.text:
I don't think I'm anything like a big sister though…… 
But, if they can enjoy this storybook then…… maybe 
I can start seeing myself like that.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿I don't think I'm anything like a big sister though…… 
󠁿But, if they can enjoy this storybook then…… maybe 
󠁿I can start seeing myself like that.

data.text:
Well, I'm also grateful that you helped me out! After I get back 
from showing them…… I guess, I'll let you know how it went.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Well, I'm also grateful that you helped me out! After I get back 
󠁿from showing them…… I guess, I'll let you know how it went.

data.text:
Trainer helped out with a lot of things so after 
I get back from showing them…… I'll let you know how it went!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer helped out with a lot of things so after 
󠁿I get back from showing them…… I'll let you know how it went!

data.text:
Alright, we should probably head back. 
The fireworks will probably be over soon.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
󠁿Alright, we should probably head back. 
󠁿The fireworks will probably be over soon.

Alright, we should probably head back.

data.processed:

……Once they both get a little older…… 
I want to bring them to a festival too……

data.text:
While looking up at the fireworks and thinking about her younger 
siblings, Mejiro Dober had a gentle smile on her face.
